languages.text: "Мне поступали жалобы, что губернатор Драйвстем разорил меньшие астропатические хоры протектората. Пользуясь своим авторитетом, урезал их почти в половину. Брать оттуда еще людей — значит лишить себя связи с другими мирами. Мы могли бы попытаться нанять санкционированных псайкеров из других владений, но... Вряд ли их будет много, ведь дорога в Империум затруднена".

"I have received complaints that Governor Drivestem has devastated the minor Astropathic Choirs of the protectorate. He scaled them down by almost half through blatant abuse of his authority. To take more people from these Choirs would mean depriving ourselves of the connections with other worlds. We could try to hire sanctioned psykers from other domains, but... they will be few as the road to the Imperium is perilous."
languages.original_text: "Мне поступали жалобы, что губернатор Драйвстем разорил меньшие астропатические хоры протектората. Пользуясь своим авторитетом, урезал их почти в половину. Брать оттуда еще людей — значит лишить себя связи с другими мирами. Мы могли бы попытаться нанять санкционированных псайкеров из других владений, но... Вряд ли их будет много, ведь дорога в Империум затруднена".

traits.locale_text: "I have received complaints that Governor Drivestem has ruined the minor astropathic choirs of the protectorate. He scaled them down almost in half by abusing his authority. To take more people from there would mean to deprive ourselves of connection with other worlds. We could try to hire sanctioned psykers from other domains, but... There will not be many of them because the road to the Imperium is perilous."

To take more people from there would mean to deprive ourselves of connection with other worlds. We could try to hire sanctioned psykers from other domains, but... There will not be many of them because the road to the Imperium is perilous."

To take more people from these choirs would mean depriving ourselves of the connections with other worlds. We could try to hire sanctioned psykers from other domains, but... they will few as the road to the Imperium is perilous."

We could try to hire sanctioned psykers from other domains, but... they will be few as the road to the Imperium is perilous."

To take more people from these Choirs would mean depriving ourselves of the connections with other worlds. We could try to hire sanctioned psykers from other domains, but... they will be few as the road to the Imperium is perilous."

languages.text: “我收到过投诉，说德莱夫斯塔总督破坏了王朝的小型星语唱诗班。他明目张胆，滥用职权，将唱诗班近乎削减了一半。他削减了星语者的数量，这意味着我们与其他世界的联系将被削弱。我们可以试着从其他领域招募合法灵能者，但是……由于通往帝国的道路危机四伏，合法灵能者数量十分稀少。”
languages.original_text: "I have received complaints that Governor Drivestem has devastated the minor Astropathic Choirs of the protectorate. He scaled them down by almost half through blatant abuse of his authority. To take more people from these Choirs would mean depriving ourselves of the connections with other worlds. We could try to hire sanctioned psykers from other domains, but... they will be few as the road to the Imperium is perilous."

traits.locale_text: “我收到过投诉，说德莱夫斯塔总督破坏了王朝的小型星语唱诗班。他明目张胆，滥用职权，将唱诗班近乎削减了一半。他削减了星语者的数量，这意味着我们与其他世界的联系将被削弱。我们可以试着从其他领域招募合法灵能者，但是……由于通往帝国的道路危机四伏，合法灵能者数量十分稀少。”

languages.text: «He recibido quejas de que el Gobernador Drivestem ha devastado los Coros de Astrópatas menores del protectorado. Los ha reducido casi a la mitad mediante un abuso flagrante de su autoridad. Sacar a más gente de estos coros significaría privarnos de las conexiones con otros mundos. Podríamos intentar contratar psíquicos autorizados de otros dominios, pero... serán pocos, ya que el camino hacia el Imperium es peligroso».
languages.original_text: "I have received complaints that Governor Drivestem has devastated the minor Astropathic Choirs of the protectorate. He scaled them down by almost half through blatant abuse of his authority. To take more people from these Choirs would mean depriving ourselves of the connections with other worlds. We could try to hire sanctioned psykers from other domains, but... they will be few as the road to the Imperium is perilous."

traits.locale_text: «He recibido quejas de que el Gobernador Drivestem ha devastado los Coros de Astrópatas menores del protectorado. Los ha reducido casi a la mitad mediante un abuso flagrante de su autoridad. Sacar a más gente de estos coros significaría privarnos de las conexiones con otros mundos. Podríamos intentar contratar psíquicos autorizados de otros dominios, pero... serán pocos, ya que el camino hacia el Imperium es peligroso».

languages.text: 「ドライブステム総督が保護国家内で少数派の感応通信聖歌隊を痛めつけているという苦情が届いた。あからさまな職権乱用によって、彼らを半数近くまでに減らしたのだ。これらの聖歌隊からさらに人が減ってしまえば、他の惑星とのつながりが奪われてしまうぞ。他の領域から認定異能者を雇うこともできるが...帝国への道は厳しいため、その数は少ないだろう」
languages.original_text: "I have received complaints that Governor Drivestem has devastated the minor Astropathic Choirs of the protectorate. He scaled them down by almost half through blatant abuse of his authority. To take more people from these Choirs would mean depriving ourselves of the connections with other worlds. We could try to hire sanctioned psykers from other domains, but... they will be few as the road to the Imperium is perilous."

traits.locale_text: 「ドライブステム総督が保護国家内で少数派の感応通信聖歌隊を痛めつけているという苦情が届いた。あからさまな職権乱用によって、彼らを半数近くまでに減らしたのだ。これらの聖歌隊からさらに人が減ってしまえば、他の惑星とのつながりが奪われてしまうぞ。他の領域から認定異能者を雇うこともできるが...帝国への道は厳しいため、その数は少ないだろう」

languages.text: « J'ai reçu des plaintes prétendant que le gouverneur Drivestem a grandement mis à mal les chœurs astropathiques du protectorat, les réduisant presque de moitié par simple abus de pouvoir. Réduire davantage leur nombre reviendrait à nous priver des connexions avec d'autres mondes... Nous pourrions essayer d'engager des psykers assermentés d'autres domaines, mais peu répondront à l'appel, car les routes menant à l'Imperium sont dangereuses. »
languages.original_text: "I have received complaints that Governor Drivestem has devastated the minor Astropathic Choirs of the protectorate. He scaled them down by almost half through blatant abuse of his authority. To take more people from these Choirs would mean depriving ourselves of the connections with other worlds. We could try to hire sanctioned psykers from other domains, but... they will be few as the road to the Imperium is perilous."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai reçu des plaintes prétendant que le gouverneur Drivestem a grandement mis à mal les chœurs astropathiques du protectorat, les réduisant presque de moitié par simple abus de pouvoir. Réduire davantage leur nombre reviendrait à nous priver des connexions avec d'autres mondes... Nous pourrions essayer d'engager des psykers assermentés d'autres domaines, mais peu répondront à l'appel, car les routes menant à l'Imperium sont dangereuses. »

languages.text: "Ich habe Beschwerden erhalten, dass Gouverneur Drivestem den niederen Astropathischen Chor des Protektorats dezimiert hat. Der Chor ist durch seinen skandalösen Machtmissbrauch fast um die Hälfte geschrumpft. Würden wir noch mehr Mitglieder aus diesen Chören nehmen, würden wir uns selbst der Verbindungen zu anderen Welten berauben. Wir könnten versuchen, sanktionierte Psioniker aus anderen Reichen anzuheuern, aber ... es werden wenige sein, denn der Weg ins Imperium ist gefährlich."
languages.original_text: "I have received complaints that Governor Drivestem has devastated the minor Astropathic Choirs of the protectorate. He scaled them down by almost half through blatant abuse of his authority. To take more people from these Choirs would mean depriving ourselves of the connections with other worlds. We could try to hire sanctioned psykers from other domains, but... they will be few as the road to the Imperium is perilous."
